questions: What is a new arrival on the transportation map of India ?
answers: Pipeline transport network is a new arrival on the transportation map of India to transport liquids as well as solids in slurry form.

questions: Why was the Haldia seaport set up ?
answers: Haldia seaport was set up as a subsidiary port to relieve growing pressure on Kolkata port.

questions: What is the major objective to develop Super Highways?
answers: The major objective of developing Super Highways is to reduce the time and distance between the mega-cities of India.

questions: Why was Jawaharlal Nehru port developed ?
answers: To decongest the Mumbai port and serve as a hub port for the region.

answers: The total length of roads in India is 25 lakh kilometre. 57% of this length is surfaced.

questions: What is the policy of Indian Railways regarding electrification?
answers: The rapid electrification of all the railway tracks. 1
